scripts.a11y: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npx tsx scripts/accessibility-test.ts
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check && npm run type-check:scripts
scripts.test:build: npm run type-check:all && npm run build
scripts.test:full: npm run test:build && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run a11y:quick
scripts.server:preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.server:restart: npm run server:stop && sleep 2 && npm run server:preview &
scripts.git:push: git add . && git status && echo 'Ready to commit. Run: git commit -m "your message" && git push'
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run setup:browsers && npm run type-check:all
